original_text: People were also bringing babies to Jesus. They wanted him to put his hands on each child's head. But Jesus' disciples did not like this. They told the people that they should not do it.
korean_text: 사람들이 예수께서 만져 주심을 바라고 자기 어린 아기를 데리고 오매 제자들이 보고 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: People were also bringing babies to Jesus
They wanted him to put his hands on each child's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수께 각 어린이의 머리에 손을 얹어주시기를 원했습니다

sentences.original_text: But Jesus' disciples did not like this
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 예수의 제자들은 이것을 좋아하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They told the people that they should not do it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들에게 그렇게 하지 말아야 한다고 말했습니다
